text: How I wish I had met Goethe, Stendhal, Hugo, Joyce! A friend of mine is excited. Oh, no, you're not! Luder is protesting. You couldn't have held them for more than five minutes. Almost all great writers are heavyweights. Only death makes them frequent. Finished by Luder, 1989
title: Dichos de Luder 43
author: Julio Ramón Ribeyro
